New Records: Mohammed Shami became India's leading wicket-taker in 50-over World Cups with his five for 18
Key Match Events: Virat Kohli and Shubman Gill put on 189 for India's second wicket
India lost four wickets for three runs inside four overs in Sri Lanka's innings
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma remarked that winning the match was a significant morale booster ahead of the World Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: India became the first team to qualify for the knockout stages of the Cricket World Cup
Others: Dilshan Madushanka bowled the captain, Rohit Sharma, off only the second ball of the India innings
